title: Fiskars RazorEdge SoftGrip Fabric Scissors - 8" Premium Stainless Steel Scissors with Bent Ergonomic Handle - Black
description: Fiskars RazorEdge Softgrip Scissors make it easy to cut through multiple layers of heavy material with minimum hand fatigue. Hardened stainless-steel blades feature a specially ground edge for maximum sharpness, tested to cut all the way to the tip — essential for anyone who cuts fabric. An ergonomically sculpted Softgrip handle provides unmatched cutting control and comfort, and a bent handle design keeps materials flat for precise cuts every time.
